title: ASB Mobile Banking
summary: ASB’s Mobile Banking app gives you easy access to helpful ASB tools.
description: To make your mobile banking simpler and easier than ever, ASB’s Mobile Banking app is absolutely loaded with smart features.It offers you greater choice about how you make payments. You can pay anyone to their email address or mobile number. Or if you prefer the old school bank account number method, you can still do that, too. You can pay for Trade Me won items. You can even pay for online purchases at participating merchants. Pay anyone you like, anywhere you are, any time you want.Plus there are plenty of other great features. ‘Quick Balance’ lets you view up to three designated account balances without logging in, and you can now access your ‘Quick Balance’ and make a ‘Quick Transfer’ on your Android Wear device. And when you do have to log in the optional 5-digit PIN makes it faster. There’s an ATM & Branch locator plus Transfers, Payments, Foreign Exchange rates, the ability to manage your credit card limit or pay off your home, personal or business loan faster, all from your smartphone. Keep in control of your finances by getting real-time notifications about your account and other banking related activity.To use the ASB Mobile app, you need to be registered for FastNet Classic (ASB internet banking). Please call 0800 MOB BANK (0800 662 226) to register. It’s free to use the ASB Mobile app, but your usual data costs and standard FastNet Classic transaction and service charges will apply.Downloading of this app is subject to the ASB Mobile Banking Terms & Conditions:https://www.asb.co.nz/termsandconditionsLinks:ASB website: http://www.asb.co.nzGive feedback via the ASB Mobile Banking App under the Contact Us menu
descriptionHTML:
To make your mobile banking simpler and easier than ever, ASB’s Mobile Banking app is absolutely loaded with smart features.

It offers you greater choice about how you make payments. You can pay anyone to their email address or mobile number. Or if you prefer the old school bank account number method, you can still do that, too. You can pay for Trade Me won items. You can even pay for online purchases at participating merchants. Pay anyone you like, anywhere you are, any time you want.

Plus there are plenty of other great features. ‘Quick Balance’ lets you view up to three designated account balances without logging in, and you can now access your ‘Quick Balance’ and make a ‘Quick Transfer’ on your Android Wear device. And when you do have to log in the optional 5-digit PIN makes it faster. There’s an ATM & Branch locator plus Transfers, Payments, Foreign Exchange rates, the ability to manage your credit card limit or pay off your home, personal or business loan faster, all from your smartphone. Keep in control of your finances by getting real-time notifications about your account and other banking related activity.

To use the ASB Mobile app, you need to be registered for FastNet Classic (ASB internet banking). Please call 0800 MOB BANK (0800 662 226) to register. It’s free to use the ASB Mobile app, but your usual data costs and standard FastNet Classic transaction and service charges will apply.

Downloading of this app is subject to the ASB Mobile Banking Terms & Conditions:
https://www.asb.co.nz/termsandconditions

Links:
ASB website: http://www.asb.co.nz

Give feedback via the ASB Mobile Banking App under the Contact Us menu
comments: App was all good until it stopped being compatible with my husband's phone. Now I have to listen to him complain about it.
The app is OK, stable and works on Moto G. Fonts could be bigger. When can I see my e-statements on the app?

Ok il bump you up 4 stars because you can stop being logged out if you change the settings. But due to the fact there is no way to share a transaction receipt to prove to someone you have in fact paid them. I cant give you 5 stars like the ANZ app.
It doesn't show my last card transactions. I need to see them immediately in right order. What is the problem? All other banking apps do it precisely.

Stopped working on my phone with Android 4.2 Really? Bank apps should work in any version as it's not a game. Will start using another bank as I don't want to buy a new phone. Cannot upgrade Android on my current one.
recentChanges: * We've made enhancements to the payments process when selecting dates.
* We've improved the process when ordering Clever Kash.
